hera.wallet

Class WalletBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • hera.wallet.WalletBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientConfiguer<WalletBuilder>
    Deprecated. 
    use WalletFactory instead.

    @ApiAudience.Public
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public class WalletBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientConfiguer<WalletBuilder>
    A legacy wallet api builder.

        public WalletBuilder withRefresh(int count,
                                 long interval,
                                 java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Deprecated. 
        A nonce (or chain id hash) refresh count to handle invalid case. A minimum is 1.
        Parameters:
        count - retry count. If it is less than 0, set as 1
        interval - interval value. If it's less than 0, set as 1
        unit - interval unit
